currProjects.projectDesc: Puzzle game that I'm currently working on. Inspired by Vanripper's "Helltaker" and "World's Hardest Game." In this game, players move across a checkerboard in a grid-like fashion, avoiding and controlling enemies while trying to make it to the goal within a set move limit.

pastProjects.projectDesc: A collection of Python and C# scripts connected via port programming in order to collect physiological data from the player as they wear an Empatica E4 wristwatch (device that collects physiological signals from the body). Participants of the study (children) would wear the watch while playing STEM-related Unity games and the collection of scripts would determine when they experienced heightened anxiety.

pastProjects.projectName: Canada Robotix Wind Turbine Measurement Instrument
pastProjects.projectDesc: Used Arduino Uno, other circuitry components, and scripts to measure and plot live values, such as voltage, power and rotational velocity from a wind turbine's engine.

2D mobile game inspired by the now unavailable game 'Two Brains One Mind.' Players must complete certain minigames that appear concurrently on their screen within a limited time frame, with the game ending after they fail to successfully finish a set number of tasks.

A typing game in which words spawn at the top of a player's screen and fall to the bottom. Players must type out these words before they reach the bottom of their screen in order to avoid losing. Players can, to a certain extent, dilate time, temporarily slowing down the rate at which words fall.

My first 2D platformer. Players must avoid enemies, maneuver around special terrain, and solve riddles in order to clear levels. As the player progresses, they can also shuffle between characters, each with their own unique abilities.
